com.google.inject
Interface Binding<T>

public interface Binding<T>

A binding from a Key (type and name) to an implementation.

Author:
crazybob@google.com (Bob Lee)

getSource

java.lang.Object getSource()
Gets the source of this binding, i.e. a pointer to the code which created it. Useful for debugging.
